channel.title: Deploy Chart on Devtron Labs tutorial
channel.description: Recent content in Deploy Chart on Devtron Labs tutorial

item.title: Overview Of Charts
item.description: Deploying Charts Charts can be deployed individually or by creating a group of Charts. Both methods are mentioned in the given document. Deploying Chart Select Discover and then select the chart that you want to use Click on README.MD to get more idea about the configurations of the chart Select the Chart Version that you want to use and Chart Value, you can either use the default Values or custom values.
